document_data.name: Drace
document_data.mainbody: '''Drace''' was an [[herb]] produced from the leafs of the bittergar bush, a small [[thistle (plant)|thistle]]-like shrub which grew all over [[Faerûn]], with the exception of mountainous or desert regions.{{Cite dungeon/195/Eye on the Realms: Spellslayer Wine}}
document_data.Description: Drace was too bitter to consume raw, but when cooked it lost this bitterness.
